mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* userJoin */ US (US_ID, US_PW, US_NAME, US_NICKNAME, US_TEL) VALUES (#{us_id}, #{us_pw}, #{us_name}, #{us_nickname}, #{us_tel})
mapper.select: SELECT /* userIdCheck */ US_ID FROM US WHERE US_ID = #{us_id}
SELECT /* userTelCheck */ US_TEL FROM US WHERE US_TEL = #{us_tel}
SELECT /* userLogin */ US_ID, US_NICKNAME FROM US WHERE US_ID = #{us_id} AND US_PW = #{us_pw} AND US_STATE = "join"
SELECT /* userFindId */ US_ID FROM US WHERE US_NAME = #{us_name} AND US_TEL = #{us_tel} AND US_STATE = "join"
SELECT /* userFindPw */ US_PW FROM US WHERE US_ID = #{us_id} AND US_TEL = #{us_tel} AND US_STATE = "join"
SELECT /* userInfo */ US_ID, US_NAME, US_NICKNAME, US_TEL, US_JOIN_DATE, US_OUT_DATE FROM US WHERE US_ID = #{us_id}
SELECT /* userPwCheck */ US_PW FROM US WHERE US_ID = #{us_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* userDelete */ US SET US_STATE = "out", US_OUT_DATE = NOW() WHERE US_ID = #{us_id}
